overview.en: he EDC is a token that operates on digital energy platfoms, and its value is supported by physical coal (SC) natural gas reserves (NG) andcatbon emission rights (C2) obtained through energy conservation andenvironmental protection. With the application of block chaintechnology, digital energy chain will achieve high transparency andreliable peer-to-pcer exchanges in mining. production and consumption,and facilitate the rapid implementation of encrgy supply chain relatedbusincsses.80% of the money rnaised on public exchanges by EDC tokens will bepurchased from physical coal or natural gas and stored in reserves;Another 20 per cent will buy out of the open carbon rescrve(C2).As a retum on investment, holders of tokens receive the increased value of physical cnergy rescrves and support the prices of tokens in the open market
overview.zh: EDC是在数字能源平台上运行的一种代币，它的价值由实体煤炭(SC)天然气储备(NG)以及通过节能环保方式取得的碳排放权(C2)作支持。凭借区块链技术的应用，数字能源链将从采矿.生产、消耗方面实现高透明度及可信赖的对等交流，并促进能源供应链相关业务的快速实施。对于EDC代币在公开交易所募集的资金的80%将购买实体煤炭或天然气并存入储备中;另20%将购买公开的碳排放权储备中 (C2) ,作为投资回报，代币的持有者可获得实体能源储备的价值提升的收益，也会支撑代币在公开交易市场的价格。
